description:
The theater`s opening performance is one month away. However, the 39 girls struggle to find time to meet, leading Mirai to unfurl the tent from the handmade concert and explain how they struggled to meet then too, but looking at this made her feel like they were working together. Meanwhile, the producer suggests a training camp.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feelings to Take Us Through the Door
とびらの向こう 繋がる想い
